entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
